skills.title: CAD Design
skills.description: Expert in using PTC Creo and Rhino3D for mechanical parts and assemblies. Experienced in Python and Grasshopper for model conversions.

skills.title: Manufacturing & Assembly
skills.description: Adept at sourcing materials and suppliers, manufacturing coil parts, and assembling prototypes. Conduct verification measurements to ensure quality.

skills.title: Project Management
skills.description: Skilled in end-to-end project management, including timelines, budgets, and team coordination. Delivered various gradient projects successfully.

skills.title: Finite Element Analysis
skills.description: Competent in using Ansys Mechanical for FEA, especially in medical device design and composites material selection.

portfolio.title: Rapid Imaging Gradient Insert
portfolio.description: Designed and delivered a prototype for rapid imaging. Worked closely with academic researchers.

portfolio.title: Unipolar Head Gradient
portfolio.description: Led the mechanical design of a gradient coil that eliminates encoding ambiguity. Collaborated with industry partners.

portfolio.title: Silent Gradient Coil
portfolio.description: Engineered a silent gradient coil with an integrated RF array, focusing on user comfort without compromising performance.

testimonial.description: Wout's attention to detail and innovative approach significantly accelerated our project timeline.
An asset to any team, Wout brings a unique blend of technical skill and creative problem-solving.
Wout's designs were not just innovative but also practical, striking a balance that's hard to find.
